website_summaries.verdict: A commercial grade hot dog roller that can cook up to 18 hot dogs at one time.
pros: The even-heating and slow-moving rollers cook the hot dogs uniformly
It features non-skid rubber feet, an easily removable drip tray, and dual temperature controls
The shallow design, just 13 inches deep, makes this hot dog roller suitable for the average kitchen
cons: The protective packaging is a little sparse, so be sure to inspect for damage as soon as the product arrives

customer_reviews.title: Like the machine, hate the plug.
customer_reviews.text: When our hot dog roller arrived I noticed the cord to the machine is completely detachable. When trying to assemble and attach the cord, the part you plug in to the back of the machine was sunk into the machine and could not be retrieved. I had to take the machine apart to push the plug through so I could connect it. If we ever unplug it again from the back of the machine I will have to take it apart it again. It works great but I'm not happy with the plug situation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not come with cover or lid. I believe ...
customer_reviews.text: Does not come with cover or lid. I believe there may be one available, but did not order. Have used it several times when our Sr. Center holds bingo. Does not take long for hot dogs to cook and they sell out fast. I sell the ones in front first, move back ones to front and add more to back. There are two temp controls one for front and one for back. Only gripe, to clean rollers requires that you leave on, and temp control to very low to wipe off.
customer_reviews.author: Debi Ball

customer_reviews.title: Very nice roller grill machine seems built very well.
customer_reviews.text: Quality machine thats worth every penny. Works great & looks good being somewhat compact. Only wished there were more roller grill foods available for consumers to purchase. Most companies only sell roller grill products (good stuff) to commercial convenience stores. Someday they’ll realize there’s more potential revenue that can generate from individual consumers.
customer_reviews.author: ssudnac

customer_reviews.title: Perfect hotdog roller
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our baseball concession stand for summer ball. Works great without having to have some one work a grill!! Great price
customer_reviews.author: Michele H

customer_reviews.title: Great size for home parties
customer_reviews.text: We have used it once so far. No issues, pretty easy to clean. We put some sausage on there that had cheese in it, and dont forsee doing that again. Made it a little tougher to clean. Looks professional, great size for home party, and kids like the novelty. My only issue is the manual that came with it. List all the parts, including a sneeze with directions to put together. Really felt like I was missing parts that were supposed to be there. (Listing was accurate for what I received) Instead of directions for putting together something that wasnt in the box, I could have used a few hints at where to set temps for items.
customer_reviews.author: TDraper

customer_reviews.title: Check for cosmetic issues before using
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT IF YOU PLAN ON USING IT FOR LONGER THAN A DAY. Received the product with a big dent in the bottom, which had to be beaten out for the roller to stand evenly on a flat surface. Didn’t return it because I needed it for the day it arrived. Rollers stopped rolling after three months. Ordered another one based on price, and it worked for three weeks, and then stopped turning on
customer_reviews.author: Anna k.

customer_reviews.title: Cooks great and keeps warm
customer_reviews.text: My husband really wanted this and it fixes hotdogs and brats great I wish it would have came with a lid but I would have gave it 5 stars if it wasn't so hard to clean even spraying it with pam does little to keep it from being extremely stuck on and hard to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L. Snead

customer_reviews.title: Item was Damaged and did not work correctly
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this item for a Memorial Day party. Opened it that day, plugged it in and loaded it up Dogs. The item turned on and began working, but not all the rollers rolled. Looking closer, it appears to have been dropped or dented in some way. The package did not show any sign of damage. I wish I had gotten it out a few days sooner and checked it out. Very Disappointing. I am returning and re-ordering. Will post a new review once the replacement arrives and I can actually use it.
customer_reviews.author: Shandra

customer_reviews.title: One broke one works
customer_reviews.text: We originally ordered one of these machines and then got another when orders began to increase. However, after about 45 days of use one of the machine's power buttons popped off and broke. Very disappointing as we had not been using it long. On another note the hot dogs cook quicker when they are in the middle of the rollers and closer to the front.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Suarez

customer_reviews.title: Poor packing
customer_reviews.text: First one arrived with the left side caved in. Took photos and returned it. They made it good and sent one to me that seems to work. Gave the 2 stars because no effort was made to pack the cooker securely. The oven is not made sturdy enough to absorb the slightest impact.
customer_reviews.author: Doug570

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we were looking for
customer_reviews.text: For a company function, we were going to rent one of these. Until I found this one on Amazon for less than what I could rent one for. It came in 2 days with Prime shipping, everything was in perfect condition. It worked great for our event - we cooked about 100 hot dogs over the course of 3 hours (we were actually able to put 3 across). Cleaning it was a little time consuming but once we got right technique down, it went faster and looks like new. Now we have a Hot dog grill for future events.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The machine is sturdy and seems to be made very well. It was easy to use - I set at 300 for a couple of minutes to cook and then turned down to keep them warm. This seemed to work well.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working in 5 months!
customer_reviews.text: This item worked well enough when it worked. The other day it just quit working. Checked the power and built in fuse. Its just totally dead. My amazon return window closed, so I guess I am out of luck on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Will T

customer_reviews.title: 4 out of 7 rollers would not spin.
customer_reviews.text: Out of the undamaged box only three rollers moved. The others only made a popping sound. Upon inspection of the device I noticed the left side panel was bent inwards all the way down to the base. No food touched the device and a return has been started.--- after contacting Amazon support via chat, they waived the overnight shipping fees for a replacement... I will update my response after it arrives.
customer_reviews.author: BCM...JEC

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: We love this for hot dogs, corn dogs, taquitos, and anything else we can get to spin. Love being able to put food on this & walkbaway for a while u til it’s done, plus it’s fun to have!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Millard

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: If someone wants s to sell an abundance of hot dogs 🌭 this is the appliance to buy. I purchased this for a 4th of July picnic with 40 in attendance. I was constantly putting more hot dogs and sausages, whatever I could put on that would roll ... they were flying off the hook. I purchased another as a birthday present who is constantly entertaining. Should you purchase you will not be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: PDS

customer_reviews.title: Good dogs!
customer_reviews.text: Worked as expected. Excellent grilling. Only issue is the clean up. Tray cleans easily but rollers require work and repositioning
customer_reviews.author: MSS

customer_reviews.title: roller
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying our hot dog roller, I've cooked many dogs, sausages, eggrolls, and taquitos on it. can cook quite a few so comes in handy when having a large gathering of people over.
customer_reviews.author: Ambassador B

customer_reviews.title: Do you know why hot dogs taste so good when you're at a game or from a vendor?
customer_reviews.text: I'm not talking dirty water dogs, but because the hot dogs have been cooking evenly on rollers. So I decided to experiment and bought this cooker. It's is true, you get the same flavor as if you went to a sporting event.
customer_reviews.author: Pinseeker

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth ot
customer_reviews.text: totally worth it.. was perfect for kids party. Used ball park hot dogs which i guess werent perfectly round raw so had to help them rotate until cooked a few mins. I turned down the heat after cooked but i guess too much because they didnt stay hot. Trial and error. Now I know the temp needs to be set atleast 200 to stay warm.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't I buy this ten years ago?
customer_reviews.text: We had a gathering that featured a hot dog bar and this was an essential tool that we could not have done without. The ease of having the rotating hot dogs allowing guests to serve themselves was helpful. We had no issues with various flavors/styles of hot dogs, brats, and sausages on the rollers. Clean up was easy. The taste was ever so yummy!!
customer_reviews.author: s

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for a Chiefs party we were hosting and this worked out perfect! We kept it loaded with hot dogs and everyone was so impressed with how quickly they cooked and how warm they stayed. We used it again for one my kiddos birthday parties and it was magnificent. We should have bought this so long ago!
customer_reviews.author: MB Reid

customer_reviews.title: GRILLED HOT DOGS
customer_reviews.text: This hot dog machine is the cat's meow! Cooks up hotdogs, brats and jalapeno dogs for the golf course. Always yummy!
customer_reviews.author: Puppy

customer_reviews.title: This unit is ok
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed in the way that the unit unevenly cooks the hotdogs. I tried to hotdogs on different rollers, front and back but could not find a location where the heating elements would cook evenly. The unit is pretty easy to clean and very easy to work (turn on and set the temperature). But not so great at actually cooking the hotdog (which is really what you want).
customer_reviews.author: Brian Brazil

customer_reviews.title: The entire family enjoyed this item at a recent birthday party
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected. Shipping was fast. Packed very well. The entire family enjoyed this item at a recent birthday party. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Paul T.

customer_reviews.title: Is there any warranty with this machine?
customer_reviews.text: Hello bro, I bought a hotdog roller machine from 3 weeks ago, and I have proplem with it after the first use. The proplem is the rollers doesn’t movement and i think the motor has proplem. So help me please!
customer_reviews.author: Najem

customer_reviews.title: Get One
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. We used it to cook hotdogs, Italian sausage, brats, and cheese sticks for a family get together. It was easy to use and quickly got the food ready. Also the left overs had great flavor when reheated in the microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent machine!
customer_reviews.text: We used it for the first time this weekend, and worked just as I expected it to! Cooked hot dogs and polish dogs on it and theycame out very juicy and tender not dried out or rubbery! Excellent machine!

customer_reviews.title: Almost ruined the party menu!
customer_reviews.text: Got from the warehouse; was only supposed to have cosmetic damage. Opened night before a party where I was having hotdog bar. DID NOT WORK AT ALL! Bf spent HOURS taking apart, rewiring, and fixing. Had half of the rollers working in time for the party.

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use

customer_reviews.text: Like having the option of controlling the heat as it does not take long to prepare. Clean up is difficult if you cannot get to it right away. Burners do not come off.

customer_reviews.text: We have only used this twice so far but each time, our friends said they tasted great. Easy to clean and quick to heat dogs!

customer_reviews.title: I returned it to Amazon and never got my credit
customer_reviews.text: It looked like a heck of a sturdy unit but was too big to leave on our kitchen counter and store. My wife did not look at the size when she ordered it.

customer_reviews.title: really nice for small groups or kids during summer
customer_reviews.text: Had one before ,really nice for small groups or kids during summer. Prefer this to grilling

customer_reviews.title: Works excellent
customer_reviews.text: I have not used it yet, but lent it out for a reception. It was a big hit. Has different heat settings, worked great and everyone loved it. Since I didn't clean it, I can't speak to ease of cleaning.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for parties!
customer_reviews.text: Such a hit at all of our parties!! People love ballpark style hot dogs. Have to keep an eye on them and control the tempatures, but they taste great! Add small bowls of toppings and guests will love your hot dog station!

customer_reviews.title: Plug and go
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hot dog roller for my parents place. We swim there and a hot dog roller is the easiest thing to have to feed kids and family. It is a must have for anyone with a pool.

customer_reviews.title: Good machine but doesn't have all the parts to it included
customer_reviews.text: The machine is easy to use I really like it except they came with an instruction book of how to put the glass for safety on it which is not included in the machine and does not even tell you where you can get it.. so it's a little misleading making you think when you get it it's some of the parts are missing because the book shows instructions of how to put the glass safety shield on but it is not in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work and looked used
customer_reviews.text: It didnt work. It looked like it was used so I returned it and bought a different one
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Was exacty what i ordered
customer_reviews.text: Its awesome nothing like gas station hot dogs right at home!!!

customer_reviews.title: Fuse area was broken looked used
customer_reviews.text: This is a great machine if you’re able to get one that doesn’t come busted. Needed this for a work event and the area where the fuse is inserted was completely busted. The unit was unusable because of this.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love the taste of the hotdogs. Easy to clean if you clean right away. Could use better instructions.

customer_reviews.title: Get this for your associates

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend it

product_meta.title: Olde Midway Electric 18 Hot Dog 7 Roller Grill Cooker Machine 900-Watt - Commercial Grade
product_meta.description:
The electric hotdog machine from Olde Midway makes it easy to prepare mouth-watering rotisserie style hotdogs, conveniently cooking up to 18 hotdogs at once on its 7 stainless steel rollers.

This easily portable but substantial commercial-grade cooker allows you to cook almost anywhere, without the trouble of a full-size gas grill. The high-quality construction of this 900-watt machine is ideally suited for both commercial and household use, including company cookouts, convenience stores, movie theatres, farmer's markets, concession stands at school events, backyard BBQs, birthday parties, sporting events, and more.

Versatile rollers can handle all types of meats, including standard as well as extra-large, stadium-sized hotdogs, thick and thin sausages, and even frozen hot dogs. Easy-to-use, simply place hotdogs on the rollers, and set temperature to cook. Rollers rotate a full 360 degrees for thorough, even cooking.

Dual-temperature controls located on the front panel of the hot dog maker allow for continuous cooking on the back rollers, while the front rollers keep the cooked items hot and ready to serve.

Includes a removable stainless steel drip tray for fast and easy clean up.

Loaded with safety features, this cooker has a built in-fuse, grounded US-standard 120-volt power cord, and non-skid rubber feet.

Dimensions: 23" (wide) x 13" (deep) x 7" (high). Weighs just 28 pounds.

Olde Midway is your trusted source for professional-grade appliances that provide lasting quality and exceptional value.
feature_bullets: COMMERCIAL-GRADE: Constructed of high-quality stainless steel, this commercial-grade 900-watt hot dog griller features 7 non-stick rollers that can cook up to 18 hot dogs at a time. These slow rollers are ideally suited for grilling all varieties of hot dogs, sausages, taquitos, and more.

DUAL-TEMPERATURE CONTROLS: Easy-to-use design has the power switch and separate temperature controls for front and back rollers conveniently located on the front panel. The dual-temperature controls allow for continuous cooking on the back rollers, while the front rollers keep the cooked items hot and ready to serve.

THOROUGH, EVEN COOKING: 7 stainless steel non-stick rollers rotate a full 360 degrees to cook all items uniformly. Whether cooking franks, thick stadium dogs, plump bratwurst, or even frozen hot dogs, these rollers can do it all, quickly and efficiently.

CLEAN & CONVENIENT DESIGN: Cook and grill almost anywhere, and avoid the mess and hassle of a full-size conventional gas grill with this powerful yet compact design that weighs just 28 pounds. Includes a removable stainless steel drip tray for easy cleanup.
INTEGRATED SAFETY FEATURES: Non-skid rubber feet provide a secure base for cooking, and the unit is equipped with a built-in fuse and a grounded US-standard 120-volt power cord for safety.
